attributes.action: inquire into how many Black British people have been domestically renditioned and cases covered-up?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is well known that Black people have been secretly domestically renditioned for many years in the UK. We are interested in the involvement of the Security Services and government agents in these actions.

rejection.details: Please evidence your allegation - your petition currently reads as opinion stated as fact.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
